name: DODGECOIN
description:
IronEqual Adding cryptocurrencies in games could allow for much more than just the one-way virtual currency standard.

You can learn more about cryptocurrencies in gaming and why we made DODGECOIN here.

CONTROLS LEFT STICK/WASD/ZQSD/ARROWS - Moving
(A)/SPACE - Start/Restart
(B)/ESC - Go Back/Quit  INSTRUCTIONS Survive for as long as possible. You can convert your time in Dogecoins at the end of a game!
LEADERBOARDS

DODGECOIN features Gamejolt Leaderboards:

You will be assigned a random name as a guest if you don't have a Gamejolt account logged in.

+++ Created by Niels & Nathan  for IronEqual.

Special Thanks to the LeakWatch team for playtesting! PS: Any donation made on itch.io & Gamejolt will be used to replenish the amount of available Dogecoins in the game. 
You can also directly send us Dogecoins at DEbGrcNsE9vFyoPbXrg7g5yhS8kfQfs18w (at a minmum of 10 Dogecoins per transaction)
